posts.author: magpie45
posts.content:
No matter what i do,mcafee insists that the build search engine is not only unsafe,it probably started WW2 and has been saying men things behind my back!
It just wont let me visit it!,anyone else having this problem?

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Is it blocking it when you load the page or only when you try to use the Search function?

home.comcast.net is listed as a non-secure server on my browser but it does not register as using either fraudulent sources or malware. You probably need to "teach" your McAfee what to block and what to ignore.

posts.author: magpie45
posts.content: As soon as I load it ,it go,s too the Woah!,are you sure page...even when i hit the override,go anyway button it just repeats!...i was using it less than 24 hrs before with no problem at all!...weird...and irritating!

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: I'm using avast and never had a problem with the search engine. Any McAfee user that can help magpie out there?

posts.author: magpie45
posts.content: sorted now,i swear it knows its up for renewal soon and picks on random sites too block so it can direct me too the mcafee website!...seriously!

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
magpie45 wrote:sorted now,i swear it knows its up for renewal soon and picks on random sites too block so it can direct me too the mcafee website!...seriously!
Diabolical. Like a wabbit in a trap. Have they no ethics? *sigh* Glad to read you got past it and can search in peace... finally!

posts.content: One more reason to stick with avast...
